long_description: The Mini Duffel from Poler is perfect for carrying gear to your gym, skate bowl or friend's cabin in the woods. Skateboard straps on the bottom let you carry your board when you're not cruising. Mini Duffel is the perfect carry-on travel size for worldly adventures; single outer zip pocket holds a phone and small items. Made of rugged 1000-denier Campdura nylon and lined with 420-denier nylon. Nylon webbing is the same super high-tensile-strength webbing used for seatbelts. Poler Mini Duffel features real leather hand grip and accents; Poler cyclops label on side. Adjustable shoulder strap lets you travel hands free; removes when you want to check the duffel as luggage. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: The Mini Duffel from Poler is perfect for carrying gear to your gym, skate bowl or friend's cabin in the woods. Skateboard straps on the bottom let you carry your board when you're not cruising.
